name: Grilled Italian Sausage with Peppers and Onions
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Italian sausage, bell peppers, and onions made easy on the grill. You can also serve the sausage in hot dog buns and finely chop the veggies once grilled as a "relish".  I like to add a squirt of mustard when I serve them this way.
ingredients: 1  red bell pepper, cut into strips
1  green bell pepper, cut into strips
1  yellow bell pepper, cut into strips
1 small white onion, sliced into petals
1 small red onion, sliced into petals
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
5 (4 ounce) links hot Italian sausage links
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate
Combine bell peppers and onions in a large bowl
Add olive oil, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper
Using a toothpick, poke 4 holes into each sausage to prevent them from exploding on the grill
Place vegetables in a grill basket and cook for 2 minutes
Add sausage directly to the grate and grill for 4 minutes
Flip sausage over, stir vegetables, and grill for 4 minutes more
